memory: You're Bob, the detective.

Day 1 begins.

Diana: "Bob, why are you so certain about Charlie? Did you investigate him last night?"

You: "I am the detective and I confirm I investigated Charlie last night and found him to be the mafioso. Arresting him now is the only way to save the town."

Charlie was arrested
